default.description:
Default brand color. Use it for UI elements that are related to the learners success like buttons in trainers, progress bars, idicators or motivating or important text.

Tokens for: 
–– JS: light.theme.brand.default 
–– iOS: LightThemeBrandDefault 
–– Android: light_theme_brand_default

on-default.description:
Default brand color. Use it for UI elements that are related to the learners success like buttons in trainers, progress bars, idicators or motivating or important text.

hover.description: Hover state of the default brand color. Only us in interactive elements that provide a hover state.

active.description: Active state of the default brand color. Only us in interactive elements that provide an active state.

on-enabled.description: Use brand.on-default if you need a foreground color on brand.default filled surfaces. E.g., buttons in trainers.

surface-lightened.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

surface-default.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

surface-darkened.description: Indicate surfaces in context with learners success.

on-surface-default.description: Use as forground color in context with learners success.

on-surface-subdued-1.description: Use as forground color in context with learners success.
